name: USPS Insurance
description:
ALL ORDERS are automatically insured up to $100.00 by USPS. FOR EXAMPLE, if your order total is $105.00, you could insure the remaining $5.00 of your order by purchasing $1.65 worth of insurance.

If you would like to insure your package with USPS in case of lost, damaged or stolen property, please add this ADDITIONAL cost to your order. Insurance is availble for International Kings as well! Please see the below chart to determine the amount of shipping you need and select the appropriate option. $1.65 ................ $0.01 to $50

$2.05 ................ $50.01 to $100

$2.45 ................ $100.01 to $200

$4.60 ................ $200.01 to $300

$5.50 ................ $300.01 to $400

$6.40 ................ $400.01 to $500

$7.30……………$500.01 to $

name: Expedited Shipping -US
description:
Our regular shipping cost to US Kings is $10.00, which is 2-5 day shipping, please add this ADDITIONAL cost to your order, if you would like your package overnighted

AFTER PROCESSING is complete, which can take up to 5 business days. This option guarantees 1-2 day delivery.

*Please remember after your package has been handed to USPS from King Me Hair, any delays or holds are soley handled by USPS. Once the package is handed over we have no control over delivery times. If there are any issues with delivery times please contact 1-800-ASK-USPS.

name: King Me Wanded
description:
Shipping notice

All orders take up to 5 business days for processing & production. Please remember business days do not include weekends and holidays. Once your order has shipped you will receive an email notification containing a tracking number.

About this collection

King Me Wanded is a VERY TIGHT AND SPRINGY CURL. It is an AMAZING texture, created to mimic natural blown out hair that has been curled with a curling wand! This texture gives you the lush and thick sassiness of big hair with uniform curls that can be combed out to wild fierceness! This texture is very lightweight, soft and bouncy, with medium lustre.

* We recommend the following: two bundles for a full sew in, 18+ lengths may require 3 bundles depending on desired fullness. If at all preventable, do not cut the weft and make sure to seal your wefts to prevent EXCESSIVE SHEDDING!

Maintenance & Care:

All Kinky Curly Type Hair needs maintenance and care. This is not hair to leave unattended in a ponytail - it needs moisture and care. To extend the longevity of this hair, our personal recommendation is to double seal the wefts with a sealant and install the hair on a full wig, Upart wig or half wig.

Straightening

We do NOT advise straightening King Me hair. The hair is steamed and rolled to curl. By straightening it, you will loosen the curl pattern and weaken the shaft.

Color

Our Virgin hair can be colored or dyed if desired. Our Virgin Hair is only available in its natural hair color. Shades normally range from medium brown to near black. WE CANNOT DETERMINE OR SIFT through our bundles to determine which color you will get.

Shrinkage

Please keep in mind that our hair does shrink, just like natural hair textures, the hair is longer when wet and prone to shrink by 2-4 inches when fully dried depending on your chosen collection. The lengths indicated are the lengths of the hair when stretched.

The hair is SINGLE DRAWN, so every strand WILL NOT measure to the listed length - meaning there will be variations of length within the weft. EXAMPLE: 16" will have 14"/15"/16" with the longest being 16".

King Me Wanded length chart

(Please remember kinky curly hair is prone to shrinkage and each bundle is measured by the stretched length)

Stretch Length vs. Curly Length (approx.)

Lengths above 10" range from 2"- 3.5"

approx. 10" - 3"-4"

approx. 12" - 4"-5"

approx. 14" - 6" - 7"

approx. 16" - 8" - 9"

approx. 18" - 4"-5"

approx. 20" - 6"-7"

approx. 22"- 8"- 9"

approx. 24" - 10"-12"

approx. 26" - 13"-14"p>

Price is Per Bundle

name: King Me Kurly Closure
description:
Shipping notice

All orders take up to 5 business days for processing & production. Please remember business days do not include weekends and holidays. Once your order has shipped you will receive an email notification containing a tracking number. 

What is a closure?

Lace Closures are a very useful tool for closing hair extensions and weaves. It can allow the wearer to wear a full weave with no hair left out while giving the appearance of a natural scalp area. It's measurements are 4X4 and it can be parted anywhere.

About this collection

King Me Kurly is 100% virgin hair that has been tailored to match 3C & 4A hair and is the best texture for our Kurly haired Kings! It is the most believable and blendable hair option can be described as very lightweight, soft, and bouncy! This hair is has medium lustre.

* We recommend the following: two bundles for a full sew in, 18+ lengths may require 3 bundles depending on desired fullness. If at all preventable, do not cut the weft.

Straightening

We do NOT advise straightening King Me hair. The hair is steamed and rolled to curl. By straightening it, you will loosen the curl pattern and weaken the shaft.

Color

Our Virgin hair can be colored or dyed if desired. Our Virgin Hair is only available in its natural hair color. Shades normally range from medium brown to near black. WE CANNOT DETERMINE OR SIFT through our bundles to determine which color you will get.

Shrinkage

Please keep in mind that our hair does shrink, just like natural hair textures, the hair is longer when wet and prone to shrink by 2-4 inches when fully dried depending on your chosen collection. The lengths indicated are the lengths of the hair when stretched.

The hair is SINGLE DRAWN, so every strand WILL NOT measure to the listed length - meaning there will be variations of length within the weft. EXAMPLE: 16" will have 14"/15"/16" with the longest being 16".

King Me Kurly length chart

(Please remember kinky curly hair is prone to shrinkage and each bundle is measures by the stretched length)

Stretch Length vs. Curly Length (approx.)

approx. 10" - 3"-4"

approx. 12" - 4"-5"

approx. 14" - 6" - 7"

approx. 16" - 8" - 9"

approx. 18" - 10" - 11"

name: King Me Kurly Full Lace Wig
description:
Shipping Notice

All orders take up to 5 business days for processing & production. Please remember business days do not include weekends and holidays. Once your order has shipped you will receive an email notification containing a tracking number.

About this wig

King Me Kurly wigs have 100% virgin hair that has been tailored to match 3C & 4A hair and is the best texture for our Kurly haired Kings! It is the most believable and blendable hair option can be described as very lightweight, soft, and bouncy! This hair is has medium lustre and is unprocessed. Our wigs are constructed from premium hand selected hair, harvested from a single donor with its cuticles left intact and no chemical alteration. This unit comes UNSTYLED as shown on the mannequin. Each strand of hair is healthy from root to tip.

Difference between a Full lace Wig & Lace Front Wig.

A full lace front wig is capable of being parted anywhere on the scalp. This is a great option if you are going to have the hair going back giving a completely natural hairline worn back, down or in a ponytail. The lace front wigs have the lace in the forehead of the wig. This will still provide a completely natural look but with the front lace you cannot put it back in a high pony tail.

Color

Our Virgin hair can be colored or dyed if desired. Our Virgin Hair is only available in its natural hair color. Shades normally range from medium brown to near black. WE CANNOT DETERMINE OR SIFT through our bundles to determine which color you will get.

Straightening

We do NOT advise straightening King Me hair. The hair is steamed and rolled to curl. By straightening it, you will loosen the curl pattern and weaken the shaft

Shrinkage

Please keep in mind that our hair does shrink, just like natural hair textures, the hair is longer when wet and prone to shrink by 2-4 inches when fully dried depending on your chosen collection. The lengths indicated are the lengths of the hair when stretched.

Features

Medium Cap Size

100% Premium Virgin hair

Full lace Cap with Stretch Panel

Hair Density: Light-Medium (120%)

Baby Hair around the entire perimeter

Light weight and comfortable on the scalp.

Natural Color: (natural black/off black/Darkest brown)

Can be styled in an up do or high pony & parted anywhere

Measurements: Circumference:22.5 Front to Nape:14.5 Ear to Ear Across Forehead:12.5 Ear to Ear Over Top:12.5 Temple to Temple Around Back:14.5 Nape of Neck:5.5

About this collection

King Me Kinky is 100% virgin hair that has been tailored to match 4B & 4C hair and is the best texture for our Kinky haired Kings! It is the most believable and blendable hair option can be described as very full, thick, cotton-like and of course kinky! This hair has the lowest level of lustre in our collections.

Straightening

We do NOT advise straightening King Me hair. The hair is steamed and rolled to curl. By straightening it, you will loosen the curl pattern and weaken the shaft.

Color

Our Virgin hair can be colored or dyed if desired. Our Virgin Hair is only available in its natural hair color. Shades normally range from medium brown to near black. WE CANNOT DETERMINE OR SIFT through our bundles to determine which color you will get.

Shrinkage

Please keep in mind that our hair does shrink, just like natural hair textures, the hair is longer when wet and prone to shrink by 2-4 inches when fully dried depending on your chosen collection. The lengths indicated are the lengths of the hair when stretched.

King Me Koily is 100% virgin hair that has been tailored to match 3B & 3C hair and is the best texture for our Koliy haired Kings, whose hair has more elongated curls with less shrinkage! Our Virgin hair can be colored or dyed if desired. Our Virgin Hair is only available in its natural hair color. Shades normally range from medium brown to near black. WE CANNOT DETERMINE OR SIFT through our bundles to determine which color you will get.

Our Virgin hair can be colored or dyed if desired. Our Virgin Hair is only available in its natural hair color. Shades normally range from medium brown to near black. WE CANNOT DETERMINE OR SIFT through our bundles to determine which color you will get.

Please keep in mind that our hair does shrink, just like natural hair textures, the hair is longer when wet and prone to shrink by 2-4 inches when fully dried depending on your chosen collection. The lengths indicated are the lengths of the hair when stretched.

The hair is SINGLE DRAWN, so every strand WILL NOT measure to the listed length - meaning there will be variations of length within the weft. EXAMPLE: 16" will have 14"/15"/16" with the longest being 16".

About this collection

King Me Koarse is beautiful machine weft 100% Virgin hair, steam processed to mimic natural hair that has been blown out. King Me Koarse has lots of body and movement just like hair that has been blown out! This hair will definitely give you the sleek yet wild look with a roller or flexi-rod set. This hair comes in it's natural color which ranges from Medium Brown to Natural Black. This hair has low lustre with a medium coarse texture.

* We recommend the following: two bundles for a full sew in, 18+ lengths may require 3 bundles depending on desired fullness. If at all preventable, do not cut the weft.

name: King Me Koarse Closure
description:
Shipping notice

All orders take up to 5 business days for processing & production. Please remember business days do not include weekends and holidays. Once your order has shipped you will receive an email notification containing a tracking number. 

What is a closure?

Lace Closures are a very useful tool for closing hair extensions and weaves. It can allow the wearer to wear a full weave with no hair left out while giving the appearance of a natural scalp area. It's measurements are 4X4 and it can be parted anywhere.

name: King Me Koarse Full Lace Wig
description:
Shipping Notice

All orders take up to 5 business days for processing & production. Please remember business days do not include weekends and holidays. Once your order has shipped you will receive an email notification containing a tracking number.

About this wig

King Me Koarse wigs have 100% Virgin hair, steam processed to mimic natural hair that has been blown out. King Me Koarse has lots of body and movement just like hair that has been blown out! This hair will definitely give you the sleek yet wild look with a roller or flexi-rod set. This hair comes in its natural color which ranges from Medium Brown to Natural Black. This hair has low lustre with a medium coarse texture. Our wigs are constructed from premium hand selected hair, harvested from a single donor with its cuticles left intact and no chemical alteration. This unit comes UNSTYLED as shown on the mannequin. Each strand of hair is healthy from root to tip.

Difference between a Full lace Wig & Lace Front Wig.

A full lace front wig is capable of being parted anywhere on the scalp. This is a great option if you are going to have the hair going back giving a completely natural hairline worn back, down or in a ponytail. The lace front wigs have the lace in the forehead of the wig. This will still provide a completely natural look but with the front lace you cannot put it back in a high pony tail.

Straightening

King Me Koarse can be straightened, rolled and twisted for your styling desires.

Color

Our Virgin hair can be colored or dyed if desired. Our Virgin Hair is only available in its natural hair color. Shades normally range from medium brown to near black. WE CANNOT DETERMINE OR SIFT through our bundles to determine which color you will get.

Shrinkage

King Me Koarse does shrink up to an 1 -1.5 inch from its true length due to waves in the texture.

Features

Medium Cap Size

100% Premium Virgin hair

Full lace Cap with Stretch Panel

Hair Density: Light-Medium (120%)

Baby Hair around the entire perimeter

Light weight and comfortable on the scalp.

Natural Color: (natural black/off black/Darkest brown)

Can be styled in an up do or high pony & parted anywhere

Measurements: Circumference:22.5 Front to Nape:14.5 Ear to Ear Across Forehead:12.5 Ear to Ear Over Top:12.5 Temple to Temple Around Back:14.5 Nape of Neck:5.5
